question: Is my feedback anonymous?
answer: Your feedback is only anonymous if you toggle the "Submit Anonymously" option. Otherwise, it will be associated with your account to help us better address your specific concerns.

question: How is my feedback used?
answer: Your feedback is reviewed by our product team and used to identify areas for improvement, prioritize new features, and enhance the overall user experience.

question: Will I receive a response?
answer: While we may not respond to every piece of feedback individually, we do review all submissions. For specific issues requiring attention, our support team may reach out to you directly.

question: How long does it take to process my feedback?
answer: We typically review feedback within 1-3 business days. For urgent issues, we prioritize accordingly and may address them sooner.

question: Can I update my feedback after submission?
answer: Yes, you can edit your feedback for up to 48 hours after submission. Simply navigate to your feedback history and select the 'Edit' option on the relevant submission.

question: Is there a limit to how much feedback I can submit?
answer: There is no limit to the amount of feedback you can provide. We value your input and encourage you to share your thoughts whenever you have suggestions or encounter issues.

question: Can I attach files to my feedback?
answer: Yes, you can attach screenshots, videos, or other files up to 10MB in size to help illustrate your feedback. This is particularly helpful for bug reports or UI/UX suggestions.

question: How do I track the status of my feedback?
answer: You can view the status of your feedback submissions in your account dashboard under 'My Feedback'. We update the status as we review, implement, or close feedback items.

question: Can I see feedback from other users?
answer: We maintain a public feedback board where you can view popular suggestions and feature requests from other users. You can also upvote ideas you'd like to see implemented.

question: Do you offer rewards for valuable feedback?
answer: Yes, we occasionally reward users whose feedback leads to significant improvements. These rewards may include premium features, account credits, or recognition in our release notes.

question: How can I provide feedback about the feedback system itself?
answer: Meta-feedback is welcome! You can use the same feedback form and select 'Feedback System' as the category, or contact our support team directly.

question: Is my feedback shared with third parties?
answer: No, your feedback is kept confidential and is only used internally to improve our products and services. We never share individual feedback with third parties without your explicit consent.

question: Can I delete my feedback history?
answer: Yes, you can delete individual feedback items or your entire feedback history from your account settings. This will permanently remove the data from our systems.

question: How do you prioritize feedback implementation?
answer: We prioritize feedback based on several factors including user impact, alignment with our product roadmap, technical feasibility, and the number of similar requests we receive.

question: Can I subscribe to updates about my feedback?
answer: Yes, you can opt to receive notifications when there are updates to your feedback submissions or when feedback you've upvoted progresses through our implementation pipeline.
